name: Girl Scouts Honour
description:
Play as Lola, the newest member of troop 666 who is ready and willing to earn her badges!

Controls:

A: Move Left
D: Move Right
E: Interact
Space: Jump

This game does have sound!

Disclaimer: This is simple a game made for fun, obviously I don't condone killing people or mean offense to girl scouts in general!

All sounds and music provided by zapslat!
